title: Documentary Three Days
resume: This new style documentary observes and documents events at a certain  venue for 72 hours straight. It gives a glimpse into the ever-changing,  versatile and dynamic Korean society by closely capturing from a  heartwarming perspective the natural occurrences in people's lives at a  certain local during a three-day period of time. - KBS
